### Title
#### Scientific Editing Assistance in Support of the Canada Communicable Disease Report
#### Services de rédaction scientifique et d'édition assistante en soutien au Relevé des maladies Transmissibles au Canada

### Reference Information
- Reference Number: PW-22-01011949
- Solicitation Number: 1000238828
- Amendment Number: 8
- Amendment Date: 2022-12-09

### Tender Information
#### Invitation to Proposal
The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the provision of English general/technical writing and editing services. The contractor will work on a monthly basis and be responsible for providing expertise in the preparation of written content associated with the Canada Communicable Disease Report.
#### Contract Period
The contract duration will be from award to April 30, 2023, with three additional one-year option periods.

#### Annex A: Statement of Work
The statement of work can be found in the tender package provided. Key responsibilities include conducting general and technical writing, reviewing and editing written content, and collaborating with subject matter experts.

#### Tender Documents
- **English Document Package**: Available on the Canadabuys website.
- **French Document Package**: Available on the Canadabuys website.
- **Bidder Documents**:
	+ Q&A Guide for proposal: Q1A1 to Q3A3.
	+ Amendment document: Q8A8 to Q11A11.
	+ Amendment document: Q12A12
	+ Amendment document: Q13A13-Q14A14.

### Contract Requirements
- Language: English only.
- Work style: Off-site work at the contractor's facilities.
- Availability: The selected contractor must be available to start working immediately upon contract award.

### Procurement Details
- Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
- Procurement Category: Service
- Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
- Bilateral Agreement: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Contact Information
